kds.config module¶

The default configuration, aimed at development. The production configuration goes in $root/instance/config.py

Bases: object

Basic configuration.

class kds.config.ConfigDev¶

Bases: kds.config.Config

The development configuration. Uses an in-memory database and debugging.
